fn.p: The authors have reported that they have no relationships relevant to the contents of this paper to disclose. Bruce Lerman, MD, served as Guest Editor for this paper. William Stevenson, MD, served as Guest Editor-in-Chief for this paper.

The authors attest they are in compliance with human studies committees and animal welfare regulations of the authorsâ€™ institutions and Food and Drug Administration guidelines, including patient consent where appropriate.
